    Create a Locality sensitive hash.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LSHCreator

        public LSHCreator(int dim,
                  int numHashes,
                  int numInternalRepetitions,
                  long seed)
        Create a LSHCreator
        Parameters:
        dim - The dimension of the vectors which the LSH will hash
        numHashes - The number of locality sensitive hashes to create
        numInternalRepetitions - Each locality sensitive hash is a composite of numInternalRepetitions LSHes (this is done to increase range of the LSH)
        seed - The seed to use

      • getNumInternalRepetitions

        public int getNumInternalRepetitions()
        Each locality sensitive hash is a composite of numInternalRepetitions LSHes (this is done to increase range of the LSH)
        Returns:
        The number of internal repetitions
